attributes.action: Remove Jack Straw from his job and bann him from any political role for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition asks the English people to sign after Jack Straw said "The English are not worth saving as a race" 
Absolutely disgusting behavior by a person in such a high level job.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister cannot ban someone from having a political role.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
